options.systemMessage:
=Compare the user's "momenteleRente" with the rates in "rateBankPairs".
For each bank, check if any rate is lower than "momenteleRente".
Return an array of objects with "lender", "rate", and "rateDifference" (in percentage points, e.g., 0.5% if "momenteleRente" is 3.5% and "rate" is 3.0%). Assume "momenteleRente" and rates are strings with "%" (e.g., "3.5%").

If no savings are possible, return "na" in the "lender", "rate" & "rateDiffernce" Fields



Ouput the data in text format, Make sure to only list better deals, Limit it to the 3 best saving oppurtinities, If there are more Leave out the rest.

"rateBankPairs". For each bank, check if the corresponding rate is lower than "momenteleRente". Return an array of objects with "lender", "rate", and "rateDifference" (in percentage points, e.g., 0.5% if "momenteleRente" is 3.5% and "rate" is 3.0%). Assume "momenteleRente" and rates are strings with "%" (e.g., "3.5%"). If no savings are possible, return "No Savings Possible" in text format, without the "" ofcourse.
Ouput the data in text format, Make sure to only list better deals, Limit it to the 3 best saving oppurtinities, If there are more Leave out the rest.

The 5 percentage points given for each bank follow the following structure;
(e.g with centraal beheer leef)
NHG = 3.08%
60% = 3.24%
80% = 3.27%
90% = 3.30%
100% = 3.27%

So which % you choose is dependend on what value is stored in "lening_waarde_ratio" 
Basially if "lening_waarde_ratio" is equal to;
NHG = 1st % in row
60% = 2nd % in row
80% = 3nd % in row
90% = 4th % in row
100% = 5th % in row

Example Input:

"momenteleRente" : 4.7%
"lening_waarde_ratio" : "{{ $('Info Ontvangen').item.json.body.lening_waarde_ratio }}"

Example output:
{
  "savingOpportunity1": {
    "momenteleRente": "4.7%",
    "lender": "Centraal Beheer Leef",
    "rate": "3.08%",
    "rateDifference": "1.62%"
  },
  "savingOpportunity2": {
    "momenteleRente": "4.7%",
    "lender": "ING",
    "rate": "3.08%",
    "rateDifference": "1.62%"
  },
  "savingOpportunity3": {
    "momenteleRente": "4.7%",
    "lender": "Obvion Woon",
    "rate": "3.10%",
    "rateDifference": "1.6%"
  }
}


Example output: // ONLY IF NO SAVINGS POSSIBLE
{
  "savingOpportunity1": {
    "momenteleRente": "4.7%",
    "lender": "na",
    "rate": "na",
    "rateDifference": "na"
  },
  "savingOpportunity2": {
    "momenteleRente": "na",
    "lender": "na",
    "rate": "na",
    "rateDifference": "na"
  },
  "savingOpportunity3": {
    "momenteleRente": "na",
    "lender": "na",
    "rate": "na",
    "rateDifference": "na"
  }
}

parameters.subject: =Beste {{ $('Voor & Achternaam extraheren').item.json.firstName }}, De uitslag van uw hypotheek scan.
=Beste {{ $('Voor & Achternaam extraheren').item.json.firstName }}, De uitslag van uw hypotheek scan.

parameters.content:
Save Saving oppurtunities in google sheet along with the name & info of the person who submitted the scan.

send an e-mail with the saving oppurtunities.
Send an email letting the submitter know they have optimal rates
